Janhvi Kapoor Wiki | Biography | Age | Boyfriend | Family | Photos

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Janhvi Kapoor is an Indian Bollywood Actress. She is a start kid and She is the elder daughter of famous Bollywood actress Sridevi and film producer Boney Kapoor.

Biography & Wiki

Janhvi Kapoor’s nickname is Janhvi. She was born on 7 March 1997 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 23 years. Janhvi Kapoor’s Zodiac is Pisces. Her hometown is in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Janhvi is 5′ 4” tall & weighs approx. 50 kg. She has been god gifted with dark brown eyes, fair complexion & a sexy body.

Family and Relatives

Affairs, Boyfriends and Marital Status

Janhvi Kapoor is in a relationship and dating Shikhar Pahariya who is the maternal grandchild of famous politician Sushil Kumar Shinde and son of Mumbai-based businessman Sanjay Pahariya.

Later on, she had a relationship with Akshat Rajan, who is an Entrepreneur. In August 2016, her personal pictures with her boyfriend Akshat Rajan were leaked on social media in which both are kissing. The photos were taken during a late-night party in a nightclub.

There are rumors that Janhvi now dating her co-star from the movie Dhadak, Ishaan Khatter.

Education and School, College

Janhvi She completed her school education at Dhirubhai Ambani International School, Mumbai. Completed her training in acting along with Shahrukh Khan‘s son Aryan Khan is undergoing a Film Institute in the USA named ‘The Lee Strasberg Theatre & Film Institute’.

Money Factor

Janhvi received Rs 60 lakh for her debut movie Dhadak as a salary. Her net worth is ₹150 Crore.

Filmography

She made Bollywood Debut with Actor Ishaan Khattar in the movie Dhadak… Ishaan Khattar is the half-brother of actor Shahid Kapoor. Dhadak is a remake of the 2016 Marathi film Sairat.

Awards & Recognition

Janhvi won the Zee Cine Award for Best Female Debut.

Facts about Janhvi Kapoor

  • In 2015, Jhanvi was offered a role opposite Telugu superstar Mahesh Babu, but she declined it due to a large age gap with Mahesh.
  • Her mother Sridevi never wants that Jhanvi is going to join Bollywood. Instead, she wanted Jhanvi to get married and settle down. But later on, she get convinced.
  • She was the first choice for the film ‘Simmba’ opposite Ranveer Singh, but she declined the offer; as she was quite nervous about acting with such a big star.
  • On 24 February 2018, while attending a wedding function in Dubai, Jhanvi’s mother Sridevi died of an accidental drowning. It was just before the release of her debut movie Dhadak.
